azureblobstorage_bucket_linked: ${user} linked the Azure Blob Storage container ${bucket} to ${node}
azureblobstorage_bucket_unlinked: ${user} unselected the Azure Blob Storage container ${bucket} in ${node}
azureblobstorage_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to Azure Blob Storage container ${bucket} in ${node}
azureblobstorage_file_removed: ${user} removed ${path} in Azure Blob Storage container ${bucket} in ${node}
azureblobstorage_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in Azure Blob Storage container ${bucket} in ${node}
azureblobstorage_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in Azure Blob Storage container ${bucket} in ${node}
azureblobstorage_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Azure Blob Storage addon for ${node}
azureblobstorage_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the Azure Blob Storage addon for ${node}
azureblobstorage_node_deauthorized_no_us: Azure Blob Storage addon for ${node} deauthorized
